title: Teriyaki tofu
author: Danny Burrow
instructions: Press excess water from tofu. Cut into bite-size pieces. Dredge in cornflour. Deep fry. Drain excess oil, then coat in teriyaki sauce. Serve over rice.

title: BBQ Pulled Pork
author: Danny Burrow
instructions: Pat pork shoulder dry and liberally coat with salt and spices. Place on a rack in oven at 225F for 8-12 hours, until roast is fall-apart tender. Cool slightly, then shred. Mix with skimmed and strained pan drippings as desired.

title: Gbegiri (Bean Soup)
author: Herdam
ingredients: 2 cups black-eyed peas (or any preferred beans)
1-2 cups assorted meats (e.g., goat, beef, or chicken), cooked
Chopped spinach or ugu leaves (optional, for garnish)
instructions: Soak the beans in water for a few hours or overnight. Rinse and cook in a pot with fresh water until soft. Once cooked, blend the beans with a bit of water until smooth. In a separate pot, heat palm oil and saut√© the chopped onion until translucent. Add the blended beans, crayfish, dried pepper, and salt. Stir well and simmer for about 10-15 minutes. Add cooked assorted meats and adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve hot, garnished with spinach or ugu leaves if desired.
